name: Moalboal at its finest!
description: Cebu is not only known for its City lights and parties! if you haven't gone to the country side then your missing out!... A LOT! you have to go see and experience the best of Filipino nativity, culture and nature! so its my job to take you to places that not many tourist knows about and give you the best there is! and where else would it be than Moalboal Cebu! :D Corals, waterfalls, white sand beaches, cockpit arenas, livestock market, sea slugs, sea turtles and many other marine life it is! The special part of this trip is the Snorkeling and a promising 98 meters high waterfall!
